creator: Joshua Hall
newsArray.description: INDIA cricket star Rishabh Pant was forced to retire with injury from Day One of England's fourth test with India.Pant was carried off the Old Traffor

newsArray.title: BCCI Takes Big Step As Asia Cup 2025 Fate Likely To Be Decided Soon: Report
creator: Shaunak Ghosh
newsArray.description: BCCI is likely to attend the ACC AGM on July 24, after initially declining to attend the event that is being held in Dhaka, Bangladesh. They will attend virtually, and a deicsion on the Asia Cup is likely to be taken.
